CreateCashCollectionTable: Create Table IF NOT EXISTS CashCollection (Devotte Varchar(225),PhnNumber Varchar(10),Email Varchar(225),Amount Decimal,TransactionMode Varchar(225),CommitteName Varchar(255),CollectedBy Varchar(225),CollectedDate Varchar(225))
CreateItemCollectionTable: Create Table IF NOT EXISTS ItemsCollection (Devotte Varchar(225),PhnNumber Varchar(10),Email Varchar(225),ItemName Varchar(225),Quantity Int,CommitteName Varchar(225),CollectedBy Varchar(225),CollectedDate Varchar(225))
getTotalAmountByCommitte: SELECT CommitteName, SUM(Amount) AS TotalAmount FROM CashCollection WHERE CommitteName = ? GROUP BY CommitteName
getTotalitemsByCommitte: SELECT CommitteName,ItemName, SUM(quantity) AS Totalquantity FROM ItemCollection WHERE CommitteName = ? GROUP BY CommitteName,ItemName
